title: Monsido Web Governance Platform
creator: Monsido
description: Monsido will scan your website and locate Section 508 and WCAG 2.0/2.1 accessibility issues. With our in-app accessibility help center, you don’t have to be a developer or even familiar with Web Accessibility to get your website up to standards.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
